column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Mai says : " Orange is such an awful color . "
#Text=Zuko says : " You 're so beautiful when you hate the world . "
#Text=Mai says : " I do n't hate you . "
#Text=Zuko says : " I do n't hate you too . "
#Text=Azula says : " Ahem .
#Text=" Azula says : " Oh Mai , Ty Lee needs your help untangling her braid .
#Text=" Mai says : " Sounds pretty serious .
#Text=" Azula says : " So , I 've heard you 've been to visit your uncle fatso in the prison tower .
#Text=" Zuko says : " That guard told you .
#Text=" Azula says : " No .
#Text=You did .
#Text=Just now .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Okay , you caught me .
#Text=What is it that you want , Azula ?
#Text=" Azula says : " Actually , nothing .
#Text=Believe it or not , I 'm looking out for you .
#Text=If people find out you 've been to see Uncle , they 'll think you 're plotting with him .
#Text=Just be careful , Dum - Dum .
#Text="
